ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com yo ho yo ho a pirate s life for me pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies size g hook will make approx 9 doll yarn use red heart super saver or similar small amounts of each  black for boots and details  brown for hair and pants  dark red for belt and headband  a lighter brown so it looks like leather for pants  white or cream for shirt and belt  green for vest  a color for the skin tone or feel free to use any colors you like gauge is unimportant for this project terms single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together ch1 t = chain 1 turn blo = back loops only note this doll is worked in the round i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic adjustable loop page 2 of 10 copyright sherri bush ~ sherri crochets & crafts http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com the legs body and head row instructions stitches **left leg** the foot is started in an oval not a circle using a magic circle will not work for you here follow the instructions 1 using black boot color 14 chain 6 make 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 3 chains 3 single_crochet in last chain now working on the back side of the chain single_crochet in next 4 chains 2 single_crochet in last space 2 in blo work even 14 3 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 decrease 6 single_crochet 12 4 3 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 10 5 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 3 single_crochet 8 6 9 work even stuff foot after row
